description: The Black Cat (Felicia Hardy) is a fictional character, a supervillain and sometimes anti-hero that appears in comic books published by Marvel Comics. Created by writer Marv Wolfman and artist Keith Pollard, she first appeared in The Amazing Spider-Man #194 (July 1979).Felicia Hardy is the daughter of a world-renowned cat burglar. After suffering a traumatic event as a college freshman, she trained herself in various fighting styles and acrobatics and, after deciding to follow in her father's footsteps, adopted her costumed identity as the Black Cat.  She was ranked 27th in Comics Buyer's Guide's 100 Sexiest Women in Comics list.Felicia Hardy makes her cinematic debut as Harry Osborn's assistant in the 2014 film The Amazing Spider-Man 2, portrayed by actress Felicity Jones.
name: Black Cat
powers: Expert martial artist with excellent gymnastic abilities
